### Manta Ray, Giant

_Swooping manta rays as large as longboats. Gentle and intelligent enough to be trained._

**LV** 8, **AL** N
**AC** 13, **HP** 37, **MV** double near (swim)
**ATK** 2 sting +5 (1d12 + poison)

**Poison:** DC 15 CON or drop to 0 hit points in 1d4 rounds.
